properties.body:
SOUTHERN ADRIATIC SEA.
HOT AIR BALLOON, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD, DOWN VICINITY
42-10.1N 016-08.2E AT 290558Z JAN. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF
POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 390 6592 4145, 390 65908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 390 65908 4793 OR JRCC PIREAUS,
PHONE: 3 021 0411 2500, FAX: 3 021 0413 2398.
